The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 30 August is 2,953 (341.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 26 August, there were 52 new confirmed cases (6.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 19 August, there were 42 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 24% (10 extra cases).
